body: So we're going to remember all the intermediate outputs? That's not a very good idea, because we save _**a lot**_ of memory, by only keeping what we want. `Variable`s can be huge.
body_html: So we're going to remember all the intermediate outputs? That's not a very good idea, because we save a lot of memory, by only keeping what we want. Variables can be huge.
body_text: So we're going to remember all the intermediate outputs? That's not a very good idea, because we save a lot of memory, by only keeping what we want. Variables can be huge.
